name: @masaajid/prayer-times-chrome
description: Chrome extension for calculating prayer times using @masaajid/prayer-times library

scripts.dev: bun run build:dev && bun run watch
scripts.build: bun run clean && bun run build:ts && bun run build:assets
scripts.build:dev: bun run clean && bun run build:ts:dev && bun run build:assets
scripts.build:ts: bun build src/popup/popup.ts --outdir dist/popup --target browser --format esm --minify && bun build src/background/service-worker.ts --outdir dist/background --target browser --format esm --minify
scripts.build:ts:dev: bun build src/popup/popup.ts --outdir dist/popup --target browser --format esm && bun build src/background/service-worker.ts --outdir dist/background --target browser --format esm
scripts.build:assets: cp manifest.json dist/ && cp -r src/popup/popup.html dist/popup/ && cp -r src/popup/popup.css dist/popup/ && mkdir -p dist/assets && cp -r src/assets/* dist/assets/ 2>/dev/null || true
scripts.clean: rm -rf dist && mkdir -p dist/popup dist/background dist/assets/icons
scripts.validate: bun run typecheck && bun run build && bun scripts/validate-build.js
scripts.package: bun run validate && cd dist && zip -r ../prayer-times-chrome.zip .
scripts.load-extension: echo 'Load dist/ folder in Chrome Developer Mode at chrome://extensions/'

author: Masaajid Team
